metadata.title: CVE-2024-47737 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:nfsd: call cache_put if xdr_reserve_space returns NULLIf not enough buffer space available, but idmap_lookup has triggeredlookup_fn which calls cache_get and returns successfully. Then wemissed to call cache_put here which pairs with cache_get.Reviwed-by: Jeff Layton <jlayton@kernel.org>

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-aws package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
linux-azure package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
linux-gcp package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
linux-gke package in noble is affected and needs fixing.

linux-intel package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
